mapper.select: SELECT A.*, C.WISHING_END_DATE FROM AS_LOG A JOIN ( SELECT AS_INFO_SEQ, MAX(AS_LOG_SEQ) AS MAX_AS_LOG_SEQ FROM AS_LOG GROUP BY AS_INFO_SEQ ) B ON A.AS_INFO_SEQ = B.AS_INFO_SEQ AND A.AS_LOG_SEQ = B.MAX_AS_LOG_SEQ LEFT JOIN as_information C ON A.AS_INFO_SEQ = C.AS_INFO_SEQ ORDER BY A.AS_info_SEQ
